meanings.definition: A South Indian dish made from fermented rice and lentil batter, typically served with chutney and sambar.
meanings.sent1: The dosai was crispy and delicious.
meanings.sent2: I love to eat dosai for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The dosai told a joke to the idli.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm as a freshly made dosai.
meanings.sent5: The dosai sizzled in the pan, filling the kitchen with a tempting aroma.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or cooking dosai.
meanings.sent1: She learned the dosai-making process from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: Dosai requires patience and skill to make.
meanings.sent3: The dosai dance competition was a hit at the food festival.
meanings.sent4: His dosai-making technique was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The dosai preparation was a symphony of flavors and textures.

meanings.sent1: I ordered a dosai for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The dosai on the plate looked appetizing.
meanings.sent3: The dosai waved goodbye as it was eaten.
meanings.sent4: The dosai disappeared from the plate in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The dosai was the star of the meal, stealing the show with its taste.
